events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the software engineer position and will begin the review process shortly.
The application for the software engineer role has been categorised correctly under the Engineering cluster following keyword analysis.
A recruiter specializing in software engineering roles has been assigned to manage this candidateâ€™s application and next steps.
The candidate completed the initial screening interview where their software development experience and skills were reviewed.
The candidate responded promptly to the interview scheduling request, confirming availability for the technical interview.
The technical interview has been successfully scheduled for the candidate to assess their software engineering skills in depth.
The candidate completed the technical interview and demonstrated strong knowledge in software development and problem-solving.
Following a successful technical interview, an HR interview has been scheduled to discuss culture fit and benefits.
The candidate completed the HR interview, showing enthusiasm for the company culture and alignment with team values.
A formal job offer has been proposed to the candidate outlining salary, benefits, and role expectations.
The candidate responded to the offer positively and expressed excitement about joining the software engineering team.
The candidate has formally accepted the job offer and is looking forward to starting the software engineer position.
Onboarding has started for the new software engineer, including orientation sessions and setting up development environments.
The recruitment case has been successfully closed with the new hire fully onboarded and integrated into the engineering team.
